subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Duke’s Gerald Henderson would seem to have a brighter N.B.A. future ahead of him than his father, who won three championship rings (two in Boston and one in Detroit). He may eventually earn a place on the mythical all-sons team ahead of his collegiate peers with more famous surnames like Jordan, Pippen and Sampson.
